document_data.mainbody:
assandra was an agent of the Harpers who was active throughout the Western Heartlands during the late 15 century DR.
She was a determined individual who remained focused during missions fraught with peril.
Lassandra wore a suit of scale mail armor, adorned with a blue skirt, and wielded a battleaxe when forced to defend herself.
In the , Lassandra led a group of her fellow Harpers, including Meygan and Yonas, through the Shadow-cursed Lands towards the Last Light Inn. During their expedition, Yonas was pulled into the darkness by a shadow and transformed into a zombie-like husk that scarcely resembled his living self.
